recent.title: UQ: total energy reduction reproducibility
recent.description: Variance across 100-sample UQ runs for ≥242× reduction claim.

recent.title: UQ: plasma density attainment probability
recent.description: Probability of achieving ne ≥1e20 cm^-3 across parameter ensembles.
recent.impact: Low attainment probability blocks pair-production feasibility.

recent.title: UQ: magnetic field stability
recent.description: Field fluctuation <1% under coil driver variability and HIL effects.
recent.impact: Field noise degrades μ invariance and confinement.

recent.title: UQ: economic FOM sensitivity
recent.description: Sensitivity of FOM to energy cost assumptions and yield uncertainty.

recent.title: UQ: High-load stability under dynamic ripple
recent.description: Quantify stability probability vs ripple using time-evolving B-series; validate probability ≥0.995 at 2e-4 ripple.
recent.impact: Ensures stability under production ripple conditions; visualized in dynamic_stability_ripple.png

recent.title: UQ: Hardware timeout reliability at 60s
recent.description: Measure probability of timeout and hardware error rates under high-load; confirm <1% over N=100 trials.
recent.impact: Protects production runs with robust timeout policies.

recent.title: UQ: Time-sweep sensitivity of FOM and yield
recent.description: Analyze change in yield, E_total, and FOM across time using full_sweep_with_time.csv; identify drift under long runs.
recent.impact: Detects slow drifts impacting viability in production timelines.

recent.title: UQ: Economic FOM sensitivity with cost model
recent.description: Propagate energy cost_per_J and price_per_antiproton across UQ runs to assess FOM robustness.
recent.impact: Quantifies viability sensitivity to cost assumptions; connects to production_kpi.

recent.title: UQ: Envelope frontier stability across seeds
recent.description: Verify top-k frontier composition is stable across multiple RNG seeds; report Jaccard similarity ≥0.8.
recent.impact: Ensures scenario selection is robust to stochastic variations.

recent.title: UQ: KPI delta robustness under anomaly injection
recent.description: Inject anomalies in timeline_anomalies.ndjson and quantify KPI delta stability (|ΔFOM| median ≤ 0.01).
recent.impact: Protects KPI from spurious timeline perturbations.
